ygData.subject: Re: Attack at the cannon (BlackNightmare->Malice, Kup, Maximals, Predadocns, Minion)
ygData.msgSnippet: BlackNightmare: Blacknightmare woke up and left her chamber completely healed, but her heart was tearing apart too. When she heard Malice s voice screaming

BlackNightmare:

Blacknightmare woke up and left her chamber completely healed, but 
her heart was tearing apart too. When she heard Malice's voice 
screaming with pain, she knew that she has to do something. She 
opened the door of his chamber and looking to him, she said "Are you 
ok?" 

Her face mirriowed pain.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Injustice/ Necross:
>  
> Injustice left the med lab and went into the mess hall where he 
fell asleep in a chair.  Necross went to his chambers and also went 
to sleep.  Splattercannon remained in the med lab, and watched the 
two CR chambers.  However, in one chamber, ther was not quiet.  
Roars and growls of pain and frustration emminated from Malice's 
room, along with pounding on the wall.  Inside the locked door, 
Malice clawed the walls, pounded the floor, and continued to scream 
in agony.
> "WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME?  WHO IS SHE?  WHY DO I KNOW HER?  WHAT'S 
GOING ON?"he cried as he fell to his knees and clutched his head.
> He pleaded to no one, to make it stop, this pain of not knowing 
what was going on inside his mind was going to tear him apart.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> BlackNgihtmare sleep.
> 
> 
> -- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Injustice/ Necross/ Splattercannon/ Hellplague:
> >  
> > Malice relished the embrace, carrying her to the medical lab 
> immediatly upon arrival.  He set her inside a CR chamber gently, 
> wishing her' goodnight' as he chamber closed.  Splattecannon came 
> running in soon afer, carrying the stasis lock Hellplague.  He set 
> her inside a chamber and closed it, then sighed.  Injustice and 
> Necross came in as well.
> > "What went wrong?" Splattercannon demanded to no one.
> > "A lot.  There were things we simply didn't know.  Somethings we 
> didn't expect," Malice said, before turning and going to his 
sparse 
> chamber.  
> > Injustice watched his 'brother' leave, unsure of what to think.  
> This was all very odd to the insane clone.  
> >
